description:
My studio is small but comfortable, with high ceilings, a king size bed, desk for work, piano, AC unit and wifi. There is a great view on the roof of all Manhattan. A kitchen with full supplies shared with Kikuko in her separate apartment. 

The neighborhood has many excellent restaurants, coffee shops, bars, music and art venues. 

(good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers)
name: Fun, Comfortable Studio in Lively Bushwick
review: The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
